item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

[quote=“nobiwa666, post:1, topic:186126”]hey some1 how i make a special attack i setted this in my client

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15351 && specialAmount <= 49) {//sarazword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15351 && specialAmount >= 49) {//sarazword startAnimation(1499); stillgfx(245, absY, absX); stillgfx(365, absY, absX); stillgfx(366, absY, absX); stillgfx(369, absY, absX); stillgfx(396, absY, absX); stillgfx(1, absY, absX); stillgfx(442, absY, absX); stillgfx(550, absY, absX); specialDamage = 190 + misc.random(700); specialAmount -= 100; }[/quote]
this is what it look like.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount <= 49) {//sara gs
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left.");
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount >= 50) {//Sara gs
startAnimation(2890);
specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(5);
specialAmount -= 50;
}

then later in client add this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount >= 50) {
					ProjectileSpec(436, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					calculateSpecial();
					hitDiff = specialDamage;
					usingSpecial = false;
					specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
					}

hope it helps!

~lov3_rs_money

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Do you already have all the other ints and methods set up? If not go find a tutorial because it’s way to complicated to explain… You can’t just add those codes in because it won’t know a lot of the symbols.

Read full topic
